name: Last Target: Zombie Kill Ops
description:
Are you strong enough to Kill the all Zombies?

Get your gun and target the zombies now! Save the whole city. Swap your guns and zoom in to take a target down within the limited time.

It wouldn’t be a cool shooting game without an impressive Skills. Choose different guns to head into the combat against zombi. Blast your enemies with an Sniper, Ak47, Shot gun, M4, MP5. Get your trigger finger ready, the undead must be eliminated.

Zombie killing games were never advanced but now they are and we should have to create something new to leave them behind Download and enjoy the game.
